business.headline: Wall Street slides again on tariff fears; will Sensex, Nifty follow suit?Wall Street remained weak on Monday, with all three major indexes falling for a third straight session. The drop came after US President Donald Trump announced a new round of heavy tariffs on imports, which led to retaliation from major trade partners, including China.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

After Trump, EU wants India to remove tariffs on car imports: ReportThe European Union is pressing India to eliminate steep import tariffs on automobiles under a long-delayed trade deal , with India signalling a willingness to offer more attractive terms.

Sensex closes 2,200 points lower as Dalal Street logs worst session in 10 monthsStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 2226.79 points lower at 73,137.90, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 742.85 points to trade at settle at 22,161.60. Most of the broader market indices also crashed during the extremely volatile trading session.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

Apple flies iphones from India and China to dodge Trump's tariffs: ReportApple is closely studying how different tariff rules in various countries could impact its supply chain. The US remains one of Apple's key markets, and the company is trying to avoid passing on higher costs to customers.

$10 billion wiped out: India's richest 4 take a hit in stock market crashThe country's top four billionaires, Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Savitri Jindal & family, and Shiv Nadar, together lost over $10 billion as markets around the world fell sharply.

What is 'Black Monday' stock market crash? Know why it's making headlines againOn Friday, April 4, 2025, the US stock market had its worst day since the Covid-19 crash. More than $5 trillion was erased in a matter of hours as stocks plummeted, and volatility soared.

Stock market crash: What should investors do as Trump tariffs batter portfolios?Dalal Street is bleeding as global turmoil deepens amid Trump's tariff shock. Read on to find out what investors should do now amid the chaos and confusion.

India's worst stock market crashes: From Covid-19 to Trump tariffsOn Monday, April 7, the Indian stock market faced one of its biggest falls since June 2024. The Sensex fell nearly 4,000 points, while the Nifty 50 slipped below 21,750, dragging down investor confidence.

Stock market crash: Which sectors have been hit hardest today?All sectors ended deep in the red, triggering sharp wealth erosion for investors. Some bore steeper losses than others. Here's a breakdown of the hardest-hit sectors in today's session.

Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 10% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors' stock has seen a steady decline over the past few months. It has fallen by 17.12% in the last five trading days alone. In the past six months, the stock is down by 39.42%. Over the last one year, it has lost 44.50% of its value.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 reasons behind stock market crashShare market crash: Dalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

Rs 19 lakh crore wealth wiped out on Dalal Street; no stock trades in greenThe sharp fall in the stock market followed a global selloff triggered by rising trade tensions and growing fears of a recession in the United States. Markets around the world have come under pressure, and Indian stocks were no exception.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

Sensex falls to 10-month low, Rs 19 lakh crore wiped out amid Trump tariff shockShare market crash: With today's stock market plunge, the Sensex and Nifty have fallen to their lowest levels in approximately 10 months, and analysts suggest that they could fall further due to massive volatility in global markets.

Stocks to watch on April 7: Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd BankShares of firms such as Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd Bank, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, TVS, Bajaj Housing Finance, YES Bank etc. will be in focus today due to important developments.

Asian markets plunge as Trump tariffs spark global sell-off; Nikkei dives nearly 8%Asian markets tumbled sharply following Wall Street's crash, triggered by Trump's tariff escalation and Beijing's retaliation. Japan's Nikkei led the losses, diving nearly 8%, as recession fears gripped investors.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

'Black Monday': US expert warns Trump tariffs could trigger worst crash since 1987Jim Cramer warned that markets might face a bloodbath similar to 1987 - when the Dow Jones suffered its biggest single-day crash to date. He claimed that if the US President didn't 'reach out' to nations which have not imposed retaliatory tariffs and reward them for their compliance, the situation could worsen.

Piyush Goyal announces helpline for startups days after 'dukandari' jibe at themDays after questioning the innovation of Indian startups overtly focussing on food delivery and betting and fantasy sports apps, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal announced a helpline for startups if they wanted to make suggestions or file complaints.

How China-US trade war unfolded: A timeline of tariffs and countermovesChina is responding forcefully to Trump's latest tariffs with a 34% tax on US imports, rare earth export curbs, company bans, and WTO action, raising fears of another full-blown trade war.

Jaguar Land Rover to suspend shipments to US over tariffs on BritainJaguar Land Rover, which is owned by India's Tata Motors, confirmed the temporary export suspension after the Times newspaper reported the plan.

JP Morgan warns of 60% chance of global recession after Trump's tariffsFollowing the US-China trade war, global investment firm J.P. Morgan said it now sees a 60% chance of the global economy entering recession by year-end, up from 40% previously.

Wall Street shatters as Trump tariffs trigger worst day in US markets since 2020US markets suffered their steepest decline since 2020 after China retaliated against Trump's tariffs. The S&P 500 fell 6%, fuelling recession fears and intensifying investor anxiety across global markets.

Dow crashes 2,000 points as Trump's tariffs spark global market panicGlobal markets plunged as Trump's tariffs triggered a trade war escalation with China. The Dow fell over 2,000 points, crude prices tumbled, and investors feared an impending global recession.

Higher inflation, slower growth: US Federal Reserve chair warns after Trump tariffsUS Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell spoke as global markets continued a swoon that has wiped some 10 per cent off major US stock indexes since Trump announced a raft of new tariffs on Wednesday.

US stocks plummet after China's retaliatory levies in response to Trump tariffsNasdaq IXIC dropped more than 20 per cent from its all-time closing high touched in December, putting it on course to confirm a bear market.
Income tax return 2025: ITR-2 filing now made easierITR-2 is meant for individuals whose annual income is above Rs 50 lakh or who earn from sources like rent, capital gains, or other sources.

Sensex tumbles over 900 points, Nifty ends below 23,000; IT, metal stocks crashThe S&P BSE Sensex tumbled 930.67 points to 75,364.69 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 tumbled 345.65 points to settle at 22,904.45.

IT stocks bleed as market crashes. Why TCS, Infosys, Wipro shares are down?All major IT stocks declined as fears of a US recession led to heavy selling. IT companies earn a large portion of their revenue from the US market, and concerns about a slowdown in technology spending have further weakened investor sentiment.

With 'fancy ice-cream' jab, Piyush Goyal's cold message to Shark Tank judgesPiyush Goyal row: While flagging the trend of Indian startups focusing on 'fancy ice creams' and food delivery apps, Piyush Goyal drew a parallel with China to pitch for more innovation in deep-tech.

RIL share price falls 4% ahead of Q4 results. Should you sell?Reliance Industries stock: RIL shares opened at Rs 1,240 and fell to an intraday low of Rs 1,192.85 in the afternoon session. The stock was close to its 52-week low of Rs 1,156, which it touched on March 3, 2025.

US tariffs stay at 26% as White House unveils new trade documentInitially, India's tariff rate was mentioned as 27% in the earlier version of the White House annex. However, the latest revision has adjusted it to 26%.

Withdrawing EPF? Know rules for marriage, education, home and medical needsIf you require money out of your EPF for the purposes of marriage or further studies, there are set regulations one needs to adhere to. You must have been an EPF member for at least seven years and must have at least Rs 1,000 in your EPF account.

Politicians need reality check, says Ashneer Grover on Piyush Goyal's startup remarkAshneer Grover has said that Indian politicians need a reality check after Piyush Goyal criticised startups for being too focused on food delivery apps.

Pension rules updates: 8 RBI guidelines every pensioner must knowIf a bank accidentally credits more pension than it should to a pensioner, then the bank must consult the Pension Sanctioning Authority before recovering the extra money.
Explained: Why Tata Motors share price has fallen 5% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors has gone down 8.68% in the last 5 days, 33.43% in the past month and 38.75% in the last year.

Piyush Goyal slams Indian startups, urges to shift focus from food delivery appsUnion Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal criticised India's startup ecosystem, saying it's too focused on food delivery, betting, and fantasy sports apps. In contrast, he praised Chinese startups for prioritising advanced tech like EVs, batteries, semiconductors, and AI, urging Indian innovators to shift toward deeper, tech-driven innovation.

entertainment.headline: Court: Actor Nani-backed courtroom drama to premiere on Netflix this AprilThe courtroom drama Court-State vs a Nobody is set to stream on Netflix from April 11. The film directed by Ram Jagadeesh, is backed by actor Nani.

How much does Nick Jonas earn? A peek into his lavish lifestyleNick Jonas, with a joint net worth of $80 million alongside wife Priyanka Chopra, built his fortune through music, acting, business ventures like Villa One tequila, real estate, and brand endorsements.

Ed Sheeran teams up with Arijit Singh for new album? Here's what we knowSingers Ed Sheeran and Arijit Singh's upcoming album collaboration has fans buzzing with excitement. The British singer confirmed the same during a recent podcast interview.

Bollywood has to own its mess and clean it: Nushratt BharucchaActor Nushrratt Bharuccha, in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital, opened up about the post-pandemic struggles of Hindi cinema.

Jr NTR shares warm moment with Sukumar, fans hope for reunion. See pic A heartwarming photo of Jr NTR and Sukumar, shared by the director's wife Tabitha, has sent fans into a frenzy, sparking renewed speculation of a potential collaboration.

Did John Abraham bring his own pasta? Arjun Kapoor's comment leaves fans in splitsJohn Abraham's recent picture with his wife, Priya Runchal, and friends at a restaurant has emerged online. Arjun Kapoor's reaction to the photo has left fans in splits.

Mission Impossible Final Reckoning trailer: Tom Cruise is ready to risk it allMission Impossible 8 trailer: Tom Cruise's Ethan Hunt takes on AI in the final film of the franchise. Helmed by Christopher McQuarrie, it is set to release in May 2025.

Good Bad Ugly box office prediction and what Ajith Kumar's last five films earnedAjith Kumar's 'Good Bad Ugly' is all set to hit theatres on April 10. India Today spoke to trade expert in Chennai to gauge the pre-release buzz of the film.

Deepika Padukone to play Suhana Khan's mother in SRK's King: ReportDeepika Padukone is reportedly believed to reunite with Shah Rukh Khan for Siddharth Anand's King. As per reports, she is set to play Suhana Khan's mother in the upcoming movie.

The White Lotus Season 3 finale episode asks 'Is Karma even real?'The ideas of Karma, destiny and free will are explored in detail in The White Lotus, especially in the finale episode of the series. The show is currently available to stream on JioHotstar.

Mother-to-be Kiara Advani to make Met Gala debut this yearAfter Alia Bhatt, Kiara Advani is all set to make her much-anticipated Met Gala debut this year. Last year, she represented India at the Cannes Film Festival.

Tamannaah Bhatia shooting dance number for Raid 2, but not with Honey SinghActor Tamannaah Bhatia has been shooting for a special dance number in 'Raid 2'. However, as opposed to the viral reports, she has not collaborated with Honey Singh for the same.

Sonu Sood's video message for drivers after wife Sonali's road accidentDays after Sonu Sood's wife, Sonali, was injured in a road accident, the actor shared an important message for all drivers. The video message highlights the importance of seat belts for passengers sitting at the back of the car.

Actor Aaditi Pohankar opens up about performing intimate scenes with Bobby DeolActor Aaditi Pohankar recently spoke to India Today Digital about sharing screen space with Ashram co-star Bobby Deol. Pohankar shared how she broke the ice with Deol on the set of the show.

TV legend Jay North dies at 73 after long cancer battleJay North, beloved star of the classic TV show Dennis the Menace, has died at 73 after battling colon cancer. He will always be remembered for the wonderful work he did.

Baeksang Awards 2025 full nominees list: When Life Gives You Tangerines leadsThe 61st Baeksang Arts Awards nominations highlight a fierce competition in Korean film and television, with When Life Gives You Tangerines leading with nine nods across major categories. Other notable contenders include Lovely Runner, Doubt, and Love in the Big City in both acting and film categories.

Tamannaah Bhatia shares why age gap doesn't affect her friendship with Rasha ThadaniActor Tamannaah Bhatia shares a profound bond with actor Rasha Thadani. In a recent interview, she addressed the age gap between them and what defines her friendships.
Kim Soo-hyun's scenes removed from G-Dragon's show Good DayK-drama star Kim Soo-hyun's segment has been completely removed from the ongoing variety show Good Day, amid the Kim Sae-ron death scandal.

Priyanka-Nick make stylish statement in black at The Last Five Years opening showPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas made a stylish entry at the Broadway opening of the singer's show, The Last Five Years, in New York City.

general news.headline: US top court rejects Tahawwur Rana's plea against extradition to IndiaThe US Supreme Court's decision marks a crucial step in India's efforts to bring Tahawwur Rana to justice for his alleged involvement in the deadly Mumbai terror attacks that claimed over 160 lives.

'Don't find fair pricing': Piyush Goyal takes aim at China on tradeUnion Minister Piyush Goyal blamed China's unfair trade practices for global economic instability, adding that Beijing's increasing dominance in global trade is adversely impacting economies like India.

RCB breach MI Wankhede fortress after 10 years after last-over thrillerIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Royal Challengers Bengaluru pulled off a stunning 10-run victory on Monday against the Mumbai Indians (MI) and beat the five-time champions at the Wankhede Stadium for the first time in 10 years.

Trump's 50% tariff threat and one-day deadline to China to undo reciprocal moveTrump threatened China with an additional 50 per cent tariff amid escalating trade tensions, prompting strong retaliatory measures from Beijing, including rare-earth export controls. The standoff triggered a global market meltdown, with major stock indices and currencies tumbling sharply.

Why new Waqf law makes 5-year waiting period a must for donationsThe Waqf (Amendment) Act of 2025 makes it a prerequisite for a person to be a practising Muslim for at least five years to make a Waqf donation. This clause has come under severe attack. A BJP MP, who was part of the Waqf bill JPC, explains what necessitated a wait period and why it is five years.

For pageviews: Rippling co-founder slams article with wife's 'forced sex' chargeDhivya Sashidhar, wife of Rippling co-founder Prasanna Sankar, has responded to her husband's online allegations with serious counterclaims in an interview to a San Francisco-based news outlet.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

At 40.2 degrees, Delhi records highest maximum temperature of seasonDelhi recorded its highest temperature of the season at 40.2°C, as a heatwave alert was issued across northwest and central India. The Met Department forecasts continued high temperatures and poor air quality this week.
Tiguan R-Line: Volkswagen's premium bet for IndiaVolkswagen Tiguan R-Line will be launched in India on April 14.

University of Bath School of Management: A Pathway to Global Career SuccessBath's School of Management blends top academics, hands-on learning, and career support to help students secure jobs at leading global companies.

Congress's key meet in Ahmedabad tomorrow, Priyanka Gandhi may get bigger roleThe Congress leadership is actively exploring a more defined, and potentially elevated, role for Priyanka Gandhi as the party prepares for crucial deliberations in Ahmedabad on Tuesday.

LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

Did Delhi Metro passenger drink alcohol in coach? Here's the truth behind viral videoAs the video went viral on social media, several users assumed that the Delhi Metro passenger was openly consuming alcohol on public transport.

Either don't delist me or share audience data: Kunal Kamra's letter to BookMyShowComedian Kunal Kamra appealed to BookMyShow not to either change the decision to delist him from its ticketing platform or give him access to audience data from his past shows.

Filmmaker Tahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapses, says 'Round 2, but I got this'Tahira Kashyap said she's 'still got this' while expressing her positive outlook towards life in a post mentioning her battle with breast cancer for the second time.

Virat Kohli becomes second-fastest batter to 13,000 T20 runsIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli became the fifth batter to reach 13000 T20 runs and the second-fastest to the milestone. The 36-year-old reached the milestone in the match against the Mumbai Indians (MI) at the Wankhede Stadium.

Mother-to-be Kiara Advani to make Met Gala debut this yearAfter Alia Bhatt, Kiara Advani is all set to make her much-anticipated Met Gala debut this year. Last year, she represented India at the Cannes Film Festival.

$10 billion wiped out: India's richest 4 take a hit in stock market crashThe country's top four billionaires, Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Savitri Jindal & family, and Shiv Nadar, together lost over $10 billion as markets around the world fell sharply.

There's no inflation: Trump doubles down as tariffs batter global marketsUS President Donald Trump denied the presence of inflation despite a global market slump, blaming past leaders and foreign nations, especially China, for exploiting the US. He defended tariffs, claiming they bring in billions weekly.

'How dare you?': Indian-origin techie confronts Microsoft bosses, quits over GazaFollowing the confrontation, Vaniya Agrawal dropped a scathing resignation letter, stating that her last day at the office would be April 11. She said she could no longer be part of an organisation that empowers 'oppressors' instead of the oppressed.

UP Class 12 student alleges gangrape by 23 men over 7 daysFollowing a complaint from the girl's family, police located her and also began questioning staff at the hookah bar. CCTV footage from the location is being examined as part of the investigation.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

CPM's Baby steps reveal a rift, dominance of Kerala blocThe CPI(M)'s internal elections, which saw the election of Kerala veteran MA Baby to the general secretary's post, reveals not just a decades-old fault line, but the dominance of the Kerala lobby over the Bengal bloc. This is critical as the party tries to take Baby steps towards revival ahead of crucial elections in its strongholds.

Noida woman gets chicken biryani instead of veg biryani; restaurant staff arrestedA woman in Noida received non-veg biryani instead of veg. Her video complaining about the 'intentional' mix-up went viral, leading to the restaurant staff's arrest.

sports.headline: RCB breach MI Wankhede fortress after 10 years after last-over thrillerIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Royal Challengers Bengaluru pulled off a stunning 10-run victory on Monday against the Mumbai Indians (MI) and beat the five-time champions at the Wankhede Stadium for the first time in 10 years.

Pakistan's Saim Ayub to return in PSL 2025 after completing injury rehabPakistan Super League 2025: Young opener Saim Ayub joined the Peshawar Zalmi squad after completely recovering from his injury. Saim was out of action since fracturing his ankle in a Test match in South Africa in January.

Virat Kohli on smashing fastest IPL fifty since 2018: Had to innovate and evolveIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli emphasised the importance of adapting to the demands of modern-day T20 cricket after hitting his fastest IPL fifty while batting first. Kohli took on both spinners and pacers in a fiery knock at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, April 07.

Rohit Sharma ruining his own legacy: Fans slam MI batterIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Rohit Sharma scored 17 runs off nine balls against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) before left-arm pacer Yash Dayal accounted for his wicket.

Hardik Pandya first India cricketer to 5000 runs, 200 wickets in T20sIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Hardik Pandya had figures of 4-0-45-2 against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), also becoming the first Indian with the landmark of 5000 runs and 200 wickets in T20s.

Watch: Virat Kohli nudges Jasprit Bumrah in on-field banter after 27-ball fiftyIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli was focussed on hitting the big ones in the middle during his 67-run knock at the Wankhede Stadium. He was involved in a playful exchange with Jasprit Bumrah, who returned to competitive action after a long injury layoff.

Injuries are a concern but we're capable of filling in big shoes: Shahbaz AhmedLucknow Super Giants (LSG) all-rounder Shahbaz Ahmed has said that injuries to fast bowlers were a concern ahead of the season, but their bench strength has successfully filled in the big shoes. LSG will take on Kolkata Knight Riders on Tuesday, April 8 at Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Hope Rishabh Pant's poor form will continue against us: KKR's Ottis GibsonKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) assistant coach Ottis Gibson hopes that Rishabh Pant's poor form will continue against them in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Pant has scored just 19 runs from four innings in the season so far.

No concerns about Sunil Narine's form, still early days: KKR assistant coachKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) assistant coach Ottis Gibson brushed aside any concerns on Sunil Narine's batting form ahead of their next fixture against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) at Eden Gardens, Kolkata.

Punjab Kings using Haaland's recovery tech to keep fresh in IPL 2025Punjab Kings players are using Erling Haaland's recovery tech to stay fresh in the IPL. Haaland invests in a company called Normatec, which is used by several plyers across several disciplines.

Siraj took 70-80 tickets for family, friends in Hyderabad, jokes Shubman GillIPL 2025, SRH vs GT: Fast bowler Mohammed Siraj delivered a standout performance in front of his family and friends, taking four wickets for Gujarat Titans against his former franchise, SunRisers Hyderabad.

South Africa announce new central contracts, 2 big stars opt to freelanceSouth Africa announced fresh contracts for its men's team on Monday, April 7. Two of South Africa's biggest batters, David Miller and Rassie van der Dussen, opted for freelance contracts.

Rohan Bopanna becomes oldest to win ATP Masters 1000 matchRohan Bopanna broke Canada's Daniel Nestor's record after becoming the oldest-ever player to win a match in an ATP Masters 1000 event. He won a match in the Monte Carlo Masters at the age of 45.

NBA: Stephen Curry shares adorable moment with son Caius in Warriors vs RocketsNBA star Stephen Curry had a heartwarming moment with his youngest son Caius during a timeout in a game between the Golden State Warriors and the Houston Rockets.

Harry Brook named England's new ODI and T20I captainYoung England batter Harry Brook has been named his team's new white-ball captain, replacing Jos Buttler, who recently stepped down from his role. He has led England in five ODIs so far and has won two matches.

Hope Digvesh Rathi does not repeat his celebration: Shahbaz AhmedKKR vs LSG: Young spinner Digvesh Rathi has been in the eye of the storm for his controversial celebration. Rathi's teammate has hoped that he will not repeat the celebration any more.

MI and Charlotte Edwards part ways as WPL-winning coach takes England jobCharlotte Edwards leaves Mumbai Indians after guiding them to two WPL titles. The England legend now takes on the challenge of coaching her national side, aiming to revive their form after disappointing World Cup and Ashes campaigns under Jon Lewis.

Jasprit Bumrah vs Virat Kohli: Wankhede prepares for epic battleMumbai Indians pacer Jasprit Bumrah has joined the side ahead of their home game against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. If Bumrah plays, his battle against Virat Kohli might turn out to be a spectacle.

Jasprit Bumrah comeback today? MI look to return to winning ways vs RCBIPL 2025, MI vs RCB Match Preview: Mumbai Indians got a major boost with Jasprit Bumrah's possible return as they gear up for a crucial Wankhede clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru, while doubts remain over Rohit Sharma's fitness ahead of the high-stakes Monday night battle.

R Ashwin's YouTube channel to not cover remaining CSK games in IPL 2025IPL 2025: Ravi Ashwin's YouTube channel will not be covering CSK matches going forward. Ashwin's YouTube admin explained the reason behind taking the decision to keep away from content related to CSK.

Ishant Sharma fined 25 per cent match fees for breach of conduct vs SRHGujarat Titans fast bowler Ishant Sharma has been fined 25 per cent of his match fees for breaching the code of conduct vs SRH. Ishant is the fifth player to be fined this season.

Nehra passes his game knowledge to us: Prasidh Krishna praises GT coachGujarat Titans pacer Prasidh Krishna heaped praise on his side's head coach Ashish Nehra, highlighting how the former India pacer helps his side's bowling attack by passing on his own game knowledge to them.

Sourav Ganguly praises GT coach Ashish Nehra after thumping win vs SRHFormer India captain Sourav Ganguly heaped praise on Gujarat Titans coach Ashish Nehra after they beat SunRisers Hyderabad away from home. Ganguly said that Nehra had tremendous game sense.

Jasprit Bumrah is back: MI's bowling leader returns with season in balanceJasprit Bumrah returns to the Mumbai Indians squad at the right time with their IPL 2025 campaign in the balance. The star pacer will have his tails up and raring to go as he will be tasked with galvanising the team once again.

MI vs RCB Highlights: Krunal Pandya helps RCB seal off thrilling win at WankhedeMumbai Indians (MI) vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) Highlights, IPL 2025: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have beaten Mumbai Indians by 12 runs in Match 20 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). MI were restricted to 209/9 in 20 overs as Krunal Pandya finished with figures of 4/45 in four overs.

SRH owner Kavya Maran left frustrated as Abhishek Sharma flops againSRH owner Kavya Maran looked visibly frustrated as her team slumped to their fourth straight loss in IPL 2025, with opener Abhishek Sharma failing yet again in what turned out to be another batting collapse against Gujarat Titans.

GT respond to Google CEO Sundar Pichai after Washington IPL comebackWashington Sundar made a strong statement in his first IPL 2025 outing for Gujarat Titans, scoring 49 against his former team SRH. This 
 prompted the franchise to revive a supportive old tweet from Google CEO Sundar Pichai praising the all-rounder.

Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
